alert.note: Alert for Barbour (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:42PM EDT until May 08 at 6:13AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in West Virginia... Tygart Valley River At Philippi affecting Barbour County. For the Tygart Valley River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tygart Valley River At Philippi. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, The intersection of US Route 119 and Truck Route 250 is flooded. Also, Sycamore Street and Beech Avenue are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM EDT Saturday was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.3 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.7 feet on 06/25/1950. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 615 AM EDT.
